rules_text:
Delve [i](Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)[/i]
When D'Vard enters, draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Sorcery cards in your graveyard have flashback {2}{R}. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
